items.title: Trump tells Putin to 'STOP!' Russian strikes on Kyiv
items.description: Trump's message to Vladimir Putin came a day after the American president said he believed that "Russia is ready" for a peace deal with Ukraine.

items.title: Dozen states sue Trump in bid to block new tariffs
items.description: The lawsuit in the U.S. Court of International Trade argues that Trump cannot use the International Emergency Economic Powers Act to impose tariffs.

items.title: Confidence in Trump's handling of the U.S. economy plummets, new polls show
items.description: Americans' views of President Donald Trump's ability to handle the economy gave him an edge during the 2024 presidential election.

items.title: Treasury Sec. Bessent says China, U.S. have 'opportunity for a big deal' on trade
items.description: Bessent named-checked Bridgewater founder Ray Dalio, who recently expressed fears of a sharp fallout from President Donald Trump's tariff policies.

items.title: Treasury Secretary Bessent calls out China, World Bank, IMF in speech on global economy
items.description: "China needs to change," Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent told the Institute of International Finance in Washington, D.C.
